attributes.action: Legal aid should not be means tested for domestic abuse victims.
attributes.additional_details: Domestic abuse victims have already been victimised by their perpetrator. This can damage a persons self esteem and confidence. To then not have accews to a solicitor for someone support and navigate them through the court process or advocate on their behalf in court it can traumatise a victim further.
attributes.background: I want government to change the legal aid criteria for domestic abuse victims in family court. Every victim should be treated fairly regardless of income.
